name: The Cleaner (itch) (Not Jam)
description:
Escape from the underground facility before it's too late!

The Cleaner is a short first-person horror game made for the HPS1 Summer of Shivers Jam.

I don't have access to a computer running Mac OS or Linux, please let me know if there's any issues running these builds and I'll try and get them working, along with any other bugs you encounter

Playable with keyboard and mouse or controller (DS4Windows recommended for PS Style controllers on Windows). Button mapping can be viewed ingame via the options menu (Esc/Menu/Options/Start)

Made in Godot // Assets made with Blender and GIMP // Audio made using Reaper and Renoise

Additional audio samples taken from https://freesound.org // textures from https://ambientcg.com/ and https://www.textures.com/
